title: Property
description: Defines an attribute that can be assigned to Categories in the Labki ontology

id.description: Unique identifier matching the filename (without .json). Convention: Has_* or Is_* prefix

description.description: Explanation of what this Property represents

datatype.description: The Semantic MediaWiki data type. Reference: https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:List_of_datatypes

cardinality.description: Whether the property accepts single or multiple values

allowed_value_list.description: Reference to a wiki page containing allowed values

display_precision.description: Number of decimal places for numeric display

unique_values.description: If true, each value can only be assigned once across all pages

has_display_template.description: Reference to a Template for custom rendering
